meanings.definition: The process of making an area more urban.
meanings.sent1: Urbanization has transformed the small town into a bustling city.
meanings.sent2: The urbanization of the neighborhood brought in new businesses and residents.
meanings.sent3: The rapid urbanization of the countryside left the cows feeling out of place.
meanings.sent4: The urbanization of the once quiet village turned it into a concrete jungle.
meanings.sent5: The effects of urbanization were evident in the crowded streets and tall buildings.

meanings.definition: The act of increasing the proportion of urban population.
meanings.sent1: Urbanization can lead to overcrowding in cities.
meanings.sent2: Government policies encouraged urbanization in the region.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected urbanization of the area caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The rapid urbanization of the town mirrored the growth of the economy.
meanings.sent5: The impact of urbanization was visible in the growing number of skyscrapers.
